| HistoryText             = The Exto Clan are described as the tougher mercenaries of the galaxy by [[Obb (Earth-616)|Obb]].

They were hired by uranium miners of the planet [[U-235]] to defend them from looters. They were also targeted by [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]], in order to proceed a debt recovery. The mercenary killed several of them to make the others spread his name, what they actually did, making his viral marketing campaign successful.

[[File:Exto Clan (Earth-616) 002.png||349px|left|thumb|Exto Clan's tank targeting [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] and [[Obb (Earth-616)|Obb]].]]

Later, Deadpool made them and the miners evacuate the planet, targeted by [[Id (Selfish Moon) (Earth-616)|the Selfish Moon]], to allow him to let Id blow U-235 and swallow it, and a nuclear weapon.
